sn35.61:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle for depleting all fuel.
sn35.61:1.3: And what is the principle for depleting all fuel?
sn35.61:1.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.61:1.5: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.61:1.6: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling.
sn35.61:1.7: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely depleted grasping.’
sn35.61:1.9: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.61:1.10: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.61:1.11: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling.
sn35.61:1.12: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely depleted grasping.’
sn35.61:1.13: This is the principle for depleting all fuel.”
